title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends with chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; chat, generate, embed, pull models in Rails scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for retrieval & generative pipelines using Ollama embeddings and chat.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, LangGraph flows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready docker-compose with Ollama, Open-WebUI, Nginx, GPU support, and automatic updates.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS with CUDA & ROCm.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app for chatting with local PDFs using Ollama + Chroma vector DB; 100% private RAG.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI wrapper exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints over Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers channel mentions using local Ollama models; threads & reactions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing slash-command chat, image-captioning, and model switching via Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package; install via pip and chat with local LLMs.
